Gangon moved his leg and dodged the eye beams.....he crwled behind a tree to
catch his footing......he pulled out a shield he got from the Predacon base
and jammed it into the wound in his chest......well, the froont half was
protected at least......he ran back to BrightBlade, not staying back despite
his serious wound and weak spark......he fired his machine gun upon Tavatron
and whatever other Maximals were in the way......
----- Original Message -----
From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, April 28, 2000 6:00 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Tavatron:
>
> Tavatron growled. So Gangon wanted to defend his little friend. Very well.
> Tavatron fired her optic lasers full blast at Gangon. She immedeatly
dropped
> back into her previous position, behind the boulder.
>
> Dinobot seemed to be holding his own, but she would feel a whole lot
better
> if he was standing beside her. Something about being away from him didn't
> feel... right. Tav sighed, no matter. She would worry about her feelings
> later. Right now defending the ark was first priority.
